name: deleteDocument
description: This API endpoint deletes an existing document from the server

path.description: A backslash (/) delimited path to access values inside object and array documents. If the path points to an array, the server will attempt to convert the array index to an integer. If the path element cannot be converted to an integer, the server will respond with 404.

$ul: **message**: The description of the error (including the name of any undefined policy module)
**errors**: Errors that may have been generated during the parse, compile, or installation of a policy module
